channel.title: Don't read this because I am telling you how to cheat private servers!
channel.description:
I have only tested this on CheezScape, because I personally love that server and the people on it, but this isn't to show everyone how to dupe. This is mainly for XeroCheez so he might be able to fix it. There is a way to dupe in your private server, cheez. It has something to do with you updating or doing whatever you do that causes your server to reset, so I'm not sure if you can fix that or not. But here is what happens.
1.) When you are training, and you don't logout to save your xp/items, it all gets lost when the server gets reset, so I tested this out with thousands of runes and money and it worked. 2.) I had my friend Timmy give me 5mil that he had ingame, then he stayed logged in and I logged out and back in to save the 5mil I had, along with about 3k of each rune. 3.) When the server reset, Timmy had not saved the data that he had given away 5mil and a lot of runes, so when he logged back in he still had it all, and I also had it because I had relogged to save my character with all the items.
So I'm not sure if it's fixable or not, I was just wondering if you knew anything about how to fix it.

item.title: Don't read this because I am telling you how to cheat private servers!

item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

[quote=“Coolnoob55, post:7, topic:4077”][quote author=mjordan link=topic=5150.msg52275#msg52275 date=1151030259]
yeah really. i mean if u could like actually use it on the realy rs then COOL. but i dont see y people play priv servers cuz u cant use it on realy rs can u?
[/quote]
???[/quote]

wats that supposed to mean?

Read full topic
